text: Mystique is a Marvel Comics supervillain/superheroine/antiheroine and mutant created by Chris Claremont in 1978. She can change her appearance to any other human or mutant. ==Fictional character biography== It is not known how old Mystique is. ==In other media== Mystique has been played by Rebecca Romjin and Jennifer Lawrence in the movie series. Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1970s Category:Fictional bisexuals Category:Marvel Comics mutants Category:Marvel Comics superheroes Category:Marvel Comics supervillains
title: Mystique (character)
